meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by leukorrhea.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with a leukorrheal infection.
meanings.sent2: Her leukorrheal discharge was a sign of an underlying issue.
meanings.sent3: The leukorrheal symptoms made her feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The room had a leukorrheal smell that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: She described the color of the discharge in a leukorrheal way.

meanings.sent1: The medication had a leukorrheal consistency that was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a leukorrheal appearance due to the staining.
meanings.sent3: The cake frosting looked leukorrheal, but it was just vanilla.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky had a leukorrheal texture, fluffy and white.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the leukorrheal essence of the landscape.
